title: PAC Prediction Sets Under Label Shift. (arXiv:2310.12964v1 [stat.ML])
abstract: Prediction sets capture uncertainty by predicting sets of labels rather than individual labels, enabling downstream decisions to conservatively account for all plausible outcomes. Conformal inference algorithms construct prediction sets guaranteed to contain the true label with high probability. These guarantees fail to hold in the face of distribution shift, which is precisely when reliable uncertainty quantification can be most useful. We propose a novel algorithm for constructing prediction sets with PAC guarantees in the label shift setting. This method estimates the predicted probabilities of the classes in a target domain, as well as the confusion matrix, then propagates uncertainty in these estimates through a Gaussian elimination algorithm to compute confidence intervals for importance weights. Finally, it uses these intervals to construct prediction sets. We evaluate our approach on five datasets: the CIFAR-10, ChestX-Ray and Entity-13 image datasets, the tabular CDC Heart dat

translated_title: PAC预测集在标签偏移下的预测
translated_abstract: 预测集通过预测一组标签而不是个别标签来捕捉不确定性，使下游决策能够保守考虑所有可能的结果。符合性推断算法构建预测集，保证以高概率包含真实标签。这些保证在面对分布偏移时失效，而可靠的不确定性量化在这种情况下尤为有用。我们提出了一种新的算法，在标签偏移设置中构建具有PAC保证的预测集。该方法通过估计目标域中各类别的预测概率和混淆矩阵，然后通过高斯消元算法传播这些估计的不确定性，计算重要权重的置信区间。最后，使用这些区间构建预测集。我们在五个数据集上评估了我们的方法：CIFAR-10，ChestX-Ray和Entity-13图像数据集，以及表CDC Heart dat。
tldr: 通过估计目标域中各类别的预测概率和混淆矩阵，然后传播不确定性并计算重要权重的置信区间，我们提出了在标签偏移设置下构建具有PAC保证的预测集的新算法。
en_tdlr: We propose a novel algorithm for constructing prediction sets with PAC guarantees in the label shift setting by estimating the predicted probabilities of the classes in a target domain and the confusion matrix, propagating uncertainty, and computing confidence intervals for importance weights.
